snippet.title: Ember Knights - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
"Ember Knights" is a multiplayer co-op hack and slash rogue-lite. Build powerful weapon combinations, restore the mythical power of the Flame and discover the real reason behind the mad God's descent into madness.

Wishlist Ember Knights on Steam today!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1135230/Ember_Knights/?utm_source=yt_gameplay_reveal

_________
#EmberKnights #gameplay #roguelite #trailer #indie
